title: LF Ranked 5 team or just bunch of friendly peeps for casual games.
body:
Im silver 2, IGN: Frostwolf77. I use skype and teamspeak. Add and message me in game, as ill probably wont look at messages here. Mainly lloking for peeps of any rank but dont take game too seriously, non-rages and some what mature.


Here's a biscuit. {{item:2010}}

replies.body: Me to. I'm a bit more of a senior citizen. I.e. I pay for the net.
